org.radirius.merc.gui

Class Panel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radirius.merc.gui.Component
      • org.radirius.merc.gui.Panel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity, Renderable, Updatable, Container
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Window

    public class Panel
extends Component
implements Container
    A component to contain and render sorted components.
    Author:
    wessles
